flawed_nl_solution:
Shay is 6 + 13 = <<6+13=91>>91 years old.
James is 91 + 5 = <<91+5=96>>96 years old.
Thomas will be 96 in 96 - 6 = <<96-6=90>>90 years.
James will be 96 + 90 = <<96+90=186>>186 years old.
#### 186

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 19, not 91. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
